results.title: Café Tertulia - Your Premier Breakfast Spot in Santiago de ...
results.content: Café Tertulia, nestled in the heart of Santiago de Compostela, is a true gem for coffee enthusiasts and breakfast lovers alike. Ashley King describes the experience as a "5-star" delight, with standout dishes like the **avocado tosta** topped with cream cheese and nuts. Whether you’re there for the *small chocolate cake* served alongside your drink or a hearty bagel with cream cheese and Serrano ham, Café Tertulia promises a delightful start to your day in this charming Spanish city. Great place for breakfast/brunch. Great coffee and breakfast spot. The coffee here is great quality, you can tell that they put a lot of care into it without being pretentious. Restaurant Restaurant
